video_prompt: A hand with a large brush paints a vibrant Asian landscape onto a creamy, round object. Miniature figures on the object's surface meticulously carve its sides with tiny tools. In the background, brushes and palettes shift. Subtle changes in lighting accentuate the painted scene and textural details as the figures work.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** A whimsical, imaginative image featuring a large, round, creamy white object, resembling a cheese wheel or cake, exquisitely painted with a detailed, vibrant traditional Asian landscape. A hand with a large brush adds a finishing touch to the landscape, while tiny figures below carve its sides with small tools. Out-of-focus painting supplies are in the background, all rendered in a soft, even light with muted, earthy tones.
refined_video_prompt: A large brush actively applies vibrant paint, its strokes continuously spreading and layering, causing an intricate visual form to emerge and deepen. Miniature figures meticulously carve, their tiny tools reshaping and developing new textures in the evolving medium. In the background, brushes and palettes subtly shift. Lighting fluidly alters, enhancing the evolving painted composition and the developing carved details as the entire process unfolds.
